title: Pope, after Gaza violence, says 'defenceless' being killed in Holy Land
text:
Pope, after Gaza violence, says 'defenceless' being killed in Holy Land 11:36am EDT - 01:07 
The pontiff has appeared to refer directly to the Gaza violence on Friday (30 March), calling for a reconciliation in the Holy Land where an ongoing conflict ''does not spare the defenceless''. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The pontiff has appeared to refer directly to the Gaza violence on Friday (30 March), calling for a reconciliation in the Holy Land where an ongoing conflict "does not spare the defenceless".
